# Project: LUCIE_2.0

This repository contains multiple AI workspaces.

Use the following domain files based on what you are working on:

@ai/composio.md   → UI, Next.js, Tailwind, UX flows
@ai/backend.md    → API, DB, Encore, Drizzle, auth
@ai/agents.md     → Mastra, workflows, evaluation agents
@ai/infra.md      → Vercel, CI, Turso, Stripe, DNS

When answering:
- Load the relevant file
- Follow its rules strictly
- Do not hallucinate cross-domain behavior
